dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data, identify patterns, and apply logical reasoning to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to guide their decision-making process.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin handle uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach unknown situations with skepticism and hesitation, preferring to gather more information before making a decision.
Your FarTwin will take calculated risks and be open to new experiences, embracing uncertainty as an opportunity for growth.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly acknowledge and share their feelings, prioritizing emotional vulnerability.
Your FarTwin will maintain a level of emotional control, only sharing their feelings with those they trust.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin navigate social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confidently establish their presence, speaking up for themselves and others when necessary.
Your FarTwin will blend into the background, preferring to observe and listen rather than drawing attention to themselves.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on visual aids, such as images and diagrams, to understand complex concepts.
Your FarTwin will focus on listening to lectures, podcasts, or discussions to learn new information.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin handle conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will directly address the issue, using assertive language to resolve the conflict.
Your FarTwin will work with others to find a mutually beneficial solution, prioritizing relationships over winning an argument.

dimensions.label: Personal Boundaries
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin set and maintain personal boundaries?

options.description: Your FarTwin will explicitly communicate their limits, being direct and assertive when setting boundaries.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, prioritizing relationships over maintaining rigid boundaries.
